text: Zodiac is a 2007 American thriller movie directed by David Fincher and based on the book of the same name. It was released on March 2, 2007. It is about investigation and manhunt for the serial killer Zodiac who has been active during the late 1960s and early 1970s. == References == Category:2007 movies Category:2007 thriller movies Category:2000s epic movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by David Fincher Category:Movies based on books Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies set in the 20th century
title: Zodiac (movie)
